display_long_description:
Welcome to Hangman VR – The Gallows, a grim and immersive reimagining of the classic word puzzle game.

Armed only with a keyboard and your wits, you’ll guess letters to solve hidden words—but every mistake brings you closer to the end. With each failure comes a chilling consequence, as the tension slowly builds toward your final fate.

Developed by De la Bere Studios, this VR experience blends spooky visuals, atmospheric music, and interactive gameplay into a haunting, slow-burn thriller.

Features:
• Over 3000 possible words to test your vocabulary and nerve
• Fully interactive VR keyboard
• One carefully crafted, atmospheric environment
• Multiple difficulty levels and word lengths
• Spooky piano-based soundtrack
• Hand tracking and controller support
• Dire consequences for wrong guesses

The gallows await. Will you solve the word in time... or join the others who didn’t?
